duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform daily branch and customer service duties with efficient and accurate transaction processing.
Promote business by providing quality customer service and handling routine inquiries.
Process deposits, payments for loans/lines of credit, U.S. Savings Bonds, night depository, ATM, and mail deposits.
Balance cash daily, adhere to security procedures, and prepare currency transaction reports.
Provide excellent customer service, contribute to meeting branch scorecard goals, and maintain positive relationships with customers.
Follow branch opening/closing procedures, order, receive, verify, and distribute cash.

Contribute to the fulfillment of the Bank’s objectives and goals by performing as a team member in allocating and coordinating the workflow.Keep current and knowledgeable about the Bank’s products and services to communicate to clients.
Ability to open and/or close the Branch, and flexibility on work schedule as business needs arise.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; Successful completion of the Bank’s in-house Sales Associate Training Program.
Previous customer service contact experience is highly desired.
Ability to travel as business necessity arises to other branch locations.
